from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType, ArrayType, StructType, StructField
from pyspark.sql import Row
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
#This is a test to see the data

# Get data out of the service bus with additional fields needed for Horizon data
service_bus_data = spark.sql("""
                    SELECT 
                        CAST(NULL AS Long) as NSIPAdviceID
                        ,cast(adviceId as integer)
                        ,advicereference AS adviceReference
                        ,cast(caseid as integer)
                        ,casereference
                        ,title
                        ,titleWelsh
                        ,from
                        ,agent
                        ,method
                        ,enquirydate as enquiryDate
                        ,enquirydetails as enquiryDetails
                        ,advicegivenby as adviceGivenBy
                        ,advicedate as adviceDate
                        ,advicedetails as adviceDetails
                        ,enquiryDetailsWelsh
                        ,status
                        ,redactionstatus as redactionStatus
                        ,attachmentIds
                        ,ValidTo
                        ,RowID
                        ,IsActive
                        ---Horizon columns
                        ,'Yes' as Section51Advice
                        ,NULL as EnquirerFirstName
                        ,NULL as EnquirerOrganisation
                        ,NULL as Enquiry
                        ,NULL as Advice
                        ,NULL as AdviceLastModified
                        ,NULL as AttachmentCount
                        ,NULL as AttachmentLastModified
                        ,NULL as LastPublishedDate
                        ,NULL as WelshLanguage
                        ,NULL as CaseWorkType
                        ,"0" as Migrated
                        ,ODTSourceSystem
                        ,IngestionDate 
                        
                    FROM 
                        odw_harmonised_db.sb_s51_advice
                        where adviceId = '30830550'

# Get data out of Horizon and matching the SB schema (with additional fields and ensure data types match)
horizon_data = spark.sql(f"""
                SELECT   CAST(NULL AS Long) AS  NSIPAdviceID
                        ,Cast(advicenodeid as integer) as adviceId
                        ,AdviceReference as adviceReference
                        ,casenodeid as caseid
                        ,CaseReference as caseReference
                        ,title
                        ,null as titleWelsh
                        ,concat(enquirerfirstname,' ',enquirerlastname)  as from
                        ,EnquirerOrganisation as agent
                        ,enqirymethod as method
                        ,enquirydate as EnquiryDate
                        ,enquiry as EnquiryDetails
                        ,AdviceFrom as adviceGivenBy --AdviceFrom
                        ,AdviceDate as adviceDate
                        ,advice as adviceDetails
                        ,null as enquiryDetailsWelsh
                        ,AdviceStatus as status
                        ,null as redactionStatus
                        ,attachmentdataID as attachmentIds
                        ,null as ValidTo
                        ,null as RowID
                        ,'Y' as IsActive
                        ,section51advice as Section51Advice
                        ,enquirerfirstname as EnquirerFirstName
                        ,enquirerorganisation as EnquirerOrganisation
                        ,enquiry as Enquiry
                        ,advice as Advice
                        ,advicelastmodified as AdviceLastModified
                        ,attachmentcount as AttachmentCount
                        ,attachmentslastmodified as AttachmentLastModified
                        ,lastpublisheddate as LastPublishedDate
                        ,welshlanguage as WelshLanguage
                        ,caseWorktype as CaseWorkType
                        ,"0" as Migrated
                        ,"Horizon" as ODTSourceSystem
                        , to_timestamp(expected_from)  AS IngestionDate
FROM
    {horizon_table} AS Horizon
WHERE
   advicenodeid = '30830550' and  ingested_datetime = (SELECT MAX(ingested_datetime) FROM {horizon_table})

#Establish aggregated view of attachmentIds
horizon_attachement= horizon_data.groupBy("adviceid").agg(collect_list("attachmentIds").alias("attachmentIds"))
horizon_data = horizon_data.drop("attachmentIds")
horizon_data = horizon_data.join(horizon_attachement, on="adviceid", how="inner")
#sort columns into same order as service bus
horizon_data = horizon_data.select(service_bus_data.columns)
Now need to sort internal ids, IsActive flags, and valid_to dates

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_nsip_s51_advice_calculations_base
AS
SELECT  
    row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY adviceid ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC) AS ReverseOrderProcessed
    ,row_number() OVER(ORDER BY IngestionDate ASC, adviceid ASC) AS NSIPAdviceID
    ,adviceid
    ,IngestionDate
    ,ValidTo
    ,'0' AS migrated
    ,CASE row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY adviceid ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC)
        WHEN 1 THEN
            'Y'
        ELSE
            'N'
    END AS IsActive                
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.nsip_s51_advice

df_calcs = spark.sql("""
                        SELECT
                            CurrentRow.NSIPAdviceID
                            ,CurrentRow.adviceid 
                            ,CurrentRow.IngestionDate
                            ,COALESCE(CurrentRow.ValidTo, NextRow.IngestionDate) AS ValidTo
                            ,CASE
                                WHEN raw.adviceid IS NOT NULL THEN 
                                    "1"
                                ELSE 
                                    "0"
                            END AS migrated
                            ,CurrentRow.IsActive
                        FROM
                            vw_nsip_s51_advice_calculations_base AS CurrentRow
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_nsip_s51_advice_calculations_base AS NextRow
                                ON CurrentRow.adviceid = NextRow.adviceid
                                AND CurrentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed - 1 = NextRow.ReverseOrderProcessed
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT adviceid FROM  odw_harmonised_db.sb_s51_advice) AS Raw
                                ON CurrentRow.adviceid = Raw.adviceid """)

#To Do: Need to complete this statement. At the moment will return duplicate fields called RowID
results = spark.sql(f"""
                    SELECT NSIPAdviceID
                        ,adviceId
                        ,adviceReference
                        ,caseid
                        ,caseReference
                        ,title
                        ,titleWelsh
                        ,from
                        ,agent
                        ,method
                        ,EnquiryDate
                        ,EnquiryDetails
                        ,adviceGivenBy 
                        ,adviceDate
                        ,adviceDetails
                        ,EnquiryDetailsWelsh
                        ,status
                        ,redactionStatus
                        ,attachmentIds
                        ,ValidTo
                        --Start Horizon only fields
                        ,Section51Advice
                        ,EnquirerFirstName
                        ,EnquirerOrganisation
                        ,Enquiry
                        ,Advice
                        ,AdviceLastModified
                        ,AttachmentCount
                        ,AttachmentLastModified
                        ,LastPublishedDate
                        ,WelshLanguage
                        ,CaseWorkType
                        ,Migrated
                        ,ODTSourceSystem
                        ,ingestionDate
            ,MD5(
                COALESCE(
                        IFNULL(CAST(NSIPAdviceID AS bigint), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceId AS integer), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceReference AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(caseid AS integer), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(caseReference AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(title AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(titleWelsh AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(from AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(agent AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(method AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(EnquiryDate AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(EnquiryDetails AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceGivenBy AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceDate AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceDetails AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(EnquiryDetailsWelsh AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(status AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(attachmentIds AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(ValidTo AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(RowID AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(Section51Advice AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(EnquirerFirstName AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(EnquirerOrganisation AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(Enquiry AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(Advice AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(AdviceLastModified AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(LastPublishedDate AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(WelshLanguage AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(Migrated AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(ODTSourceSystem AS String), '.')
                        ,IFNULL(CAST(ingestionDate AS String), '.')
                )
            ) AS RowID
            ,IsActive
    FROM 
        {spark_table_final}""")

columns = results.columns

results = results.drop("NSIPAdviceID", "ValidTo", "migrated", "IsActive")

final_df = results.join(df_calcs, (df_calcs["temp_adviceid"] == results["adviceid"]) & (df_calcs["temp_IngestionDate"] == results["IngestionDate"])).select(columns)

final_df.write.format("delta").mode("Overwrite").option("overwriteSchema", "true").partitionBy("IsActive").saveAsTable(f"{spark_table_final}")
